=================
Tensor Definition
=================
.. currentmodule:: tensordb.tensor_definition

The tensor definition is one of the most important part, due that it allows to modify the default behaviours of
any tensor using the tensor_client class

Definitions
~~~~~~~~~~~

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: api/

   StorageDefinition
   DAGOrder
   MethodDescriptor
   Definition
   TensorDefinition
